member.name: T:BarbezDotEu.Byte.ByteHelper
member.summary: Helper class containing diverse static methods that can be used in any type of context.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.ByteHelper.ToByteArray(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates a byte array from the string, using the System.Text.Encoding.Default encoding unless another is specified.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.ByteHelper.StringToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a "written" byte-array to an actual byte array. e.g. input string: 69CC766AEFAE05F6BE92A529E27D6AC50A0DC73EFB3631534B5E41A9311D56AB.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.ByteHelper.ByteArrayToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Generates a string representation of a byte array.
member.param: The hash to write as string.
member.returns: A string representation of the hash.

member.name: T:BarbezDotEu.Byte.CSharpJavaByteConverter
member.summary: Byte array converter allowing for a fast enough and accurate conversion between Java and C# byte arrays.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.CSharpJavaByteConverter.ConvertCSharpByteArrayToJavaByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a C# byte array (represented as string) into a Java byte array (returned as its string representation).
member.param: The string representation of a C# byte array.
member.returns: The string representation of a Java byte array.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.CSharpJavaByteConverter.ConvertJavaByteArrayToCSharpByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Java byte array (represented as string) into a C# byte array (returned as its string representation).
member.param: The string representation of a Java byte array.
member.returns: The string representation of a C# byte array.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.CSharpJavaByteConverter.ConvertJavaStringArrayToCSharpByteArray(System.String[])
member.summary: Converts a Java byte array (represented as string) into a C# byte array (returned as its int representation for consistency).
member.param: The string[] representation of a Java byte array.
member.returns: The C# byte array as integer array.

member.name: M:BarbezDotEu.Byte.CSharpJavaByteConverter.ConvertCSharpStringArrayToJavaByteArray(System.String[])
member.summary: Converts a C# byte array (represented as string) into a Java byte array (returned as its int representation because Java byte arrays can contain negative values).
member.param: The string[] representation of a C# byte array.
member.returns: The Java byte array as integer array.
